description.plain:
Martin Jensen is a DJ and producer from Denmark, who specializes in dance music. His DJ'ing career spans over 10 years, but he first came to be noticed for his producing in 2014, when he released his first single “Sí” through disco:wax, which was a remix of the footballer, Cristiano Ronaldo, celebrating during a match in 2014.

In 2015, he released the single “Miracles”, followed by “All I Wanna Do” in 2016, both of which brought him great success within his home country, but his first global hit “Solo Dance” was released in November of 2016 and reached Spotify’s Global Top 50 playlist.

Since then, Martin Jensen has worked together with several big international artists, including The Vamps on “Middle of the Night”, James Arthur on “Nobody”, and Jason Derulo on “Don’t Cry For Me”.

Aside from his singles, he has uploaded multiple videos to his YouTube channel, DJ Martin Jensen, in which he samples multiple noises and produces songs out of them, as well as streaming on Twitch where he mixes and plays DJ sets live.

body.plain:
Martin Jensen is a DJ and producer from Denmark, who specializes in dance music. His DJ'ing career spans over 10 years, but he first came to be noticed for his producing in 2014, when he released his first single “Sí” through disco:wax, which was a remix of the footballer, Cristiano Ronaldo, celebrating during a match in 2014.

In 2015, he released the single “Miracles”, followed by “All I Wanna Do” in 2016, both of which brought him great success within his home country, but his first global hit “Solo Dance” was released in November of 2016 and reached Spotify’s Global Top 50 playlist.

Since then, Martin Jensen has worked together with several big international artists, including The Vamps on “Middle of the Night”, James Arthur on “Nobody”, and Jason Derulo on “Don’t Cry For Me”.

Aside from his singles, he has uploaded multiple videos to his YouTube channel, DJ Martin Jensen, in which he samples multiple noises and produces songs out of them, as well as streaming on Twitch where he mixes and plays DJ sets live.

songs.title: Solo Dance

description.plain:
“Solo Dance” is the most successful single by Danish tropical house producer, Martin Jensen. It features vocals from a singer-songwriter who, for almost two years, decided to stay anonymous.

The track peaked at #1 on the UK Dance Chart and has held various chart positions in Western Europe, Scandinavia and The Americas. It was released through the Danish label disco:wax.

The track features lyrics with themes revolving around the transient-yet-amazing feeling of dancing with a paramour.

In October 2018, Theresa Rex released her debut single “Wild Ones” and revealed herself as the voice on “Solo Dance”.

Don't need nobody in my zone
I get down to the beat, I lose control
Eh-oh, I go so-, solo

Boy, you can cool it down
Not here to fool around
Just wanna dance, dance, dance
Dance, dance, dance
I know you want me
But I don't care, baby
Just wanna dance, dance, dance
Dance, dance, dance

I get down to the beat, I lose control

songs.full_title: All I Wanna Do by Martin Jensen
songs.title: All I Wanna Do

description.plain:
“All I Wanna Do” is a song by Danish DJ and producer Martin Jensen. It was released on the 8th of April 2016 as digital download by disco:wax. The song was written by Martin Jensen, Lene Dissing, and Peter Bjørnskov.

The song’s drop was sampled by Martin Jensen from the noise of a Minion toy, from the film “Despicable Me”.

songs.title: Wait

description.plain:
“Wait” is a song by Danish DJ and record producer Martin Jensen, featuring American pop duo Loote.

The song was first teased on social media by Martin Jensen on 14 August 2017 saying there will be new music releasing on 18 August 2017. https://twitter.com/djmartinjensen/status/897174856361549828
